page.title: 20CREDITS & HOPES PAGE
page.content:
The information on this area of{South {Yorkshire}was compiled by{children}of the following{schools:
{Pontefract Road First School, Cudworth {Snydale Road First School, Cudworth {Two-Gates First School, Shafton {St Helen's Junior School, Monk Bretton
We all found the work very {interesting}although it took a long time to walk round the area taking notes and talking to people. Perhaps in years to come you will see our work and think how{strange}it must have been to live in{1985}with{wars, {inequality, famine, sickness}and {unemployment.}We hope that when you read this you have put all these terrible things behind you and are able to live together in{peace}and {goodwill.
